\SetAPI{J-C}
\section{ambeth.mapping.config.validate.active}
\label{configuration:AmbethMappingConfigValidateActive}
\ClearAPI
Allows to check the value-object mapping (see \nameref{module:Merge}) during parsing the mapping file. Valid values are "true" and "false".

\type{de.osthus.ambeth.merge.config.MergeConfigurationConstants.ValueObjectConfigValidationActive}
\begin{lstlisting}[style=Props,caption={Usage example for \textit{ambeth.mapping.config.validate.active}}]
ambeth.mapping.config.validate.active=false
\end{lstlisting}
